DOC.brief_summary: This pilot trial include 30-40 participant diagnosis fibromyalgia . The purpose study evaluate internet-based treatment protocol base cognitive behavioral therapeutic principle . Participants require previous diagnosis fibromyalgia enter trial . The treatment 10 week long include participant give treatment , i.e . randomization comparison group .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Internet-based Cognitive Behavior Therapy Fibromyalgia
DOC.criteria: Current diagnosis fibromyalgia Current diagnosis severe psychiatric disorder
